app.help:
Lychee Quick CLI - Personal Dev Workflow Tool

A CLI tool built with Bun, integrating Linear, Vercel, GitHub, and Mihomo proxy management.

Commands:
  clash   - Mihomo/Clash proxy management
  linear  - Linear project management
  vercel  - Vercel deployment management

Options:
  -h, --help  Show help information

Examples:
  {cli} clash now        Check current proxy status
  {cli} linear branch    Create branch from Issue
  {cli} vercel release   Trigger Vercel deployment

Run '{cli} <command> -h' to see subcommand help.

clash.help:
Mihomo/Clash Proxy Management

Manage Mihomo (Clash) proxy operations, including status check, proxy switching, and delay testing.

Required environment variables:
  MIHOMO_URL        - Mihomo API address
  MIHOMO_TOKEN      - Mihomo API token
  MIHOMO_TOP_PROXY  - Mihomo Top Proxy
  MIHOMO_BOARD      - Mihomo web dashboard URL

board.openWait: Opening {url}, waiting for global delay test

check.help:
Delay Test

Test the latency of the current proxy node using gstatic.com/generate_204.

Output format: <proxy name> -> <latency>ms

toggle.help:
Toggle Proxy Mode

Switch between rule, direct, and global modes.

Mode description:
  rule   - Rule mode, proxy based on rules
  direct - Direct mode, all traffic goes direct
  global - Global mode, all traffic goes through proxy

linear.help:
Linear Project Management

Integrate with Linear project management tool, supporting branch creation from Issues, sending preview comments, etc.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh Issue cache

Required environment variables:
  LINEAR_API_KEY  - Linear API key
  LINEAR_TEAM     - Linear team identifier

branch.help:
Create Branch from Issue

Create a Git branch from a Linear Issue, automatically pulling the latest main branch.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh Issue cache

Features:
  - Search and filter Issues (type M for mine, N for unassigned)
  - Group by assignee
  - Auto-generate branch name and handle duplicates
  - Execute git checkout main && git pull && git checkout -b <branch>

preview.help:
Send Preview Comment

Send a preview link comment to a Linear Issue.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh Issue cache

Features:
  - Show Issues with PR associations
  - Select PR to send preview link as Issue comment

release.help:
Release Issues

Batch release Linear Issues, update status and open release notes page.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh Issue cache

Features:
  - Show Issues in started and completed status
  - Multi-select Issues to release
  - Auto-open RELEASE_NOTE_PAGE (if configured)

vercel.help:
Vercel Deployment Management

Manage Vercel deployments, including checking deployment status and triggering deployments.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh cache

Required environment variables:
  VERCEL_PERSONAL_TOKEN  - Vercel personal token
  VERCEL_TEAM            - Vercel team name
  VERCEL_PROJECT         - Vercel project name

check.help:
Check Deployment Status

Check the Vercel deployment status for a specific branch.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh PR branches and deployment cache

Features:
  - Show all PR branches
  - Select a branch to view its deployment status

release.help:
Trigger Deployment

Trigger a Vercel deployment via Deploy Hook.

Options:
  -f  Force refresh project cache

Features:
  - Select branch to deploy
  - Multi-select projects to deploy
  - Auto-open Vercel deployment page after triggering

linear.confirmSendComment: Do you want to send preview comment to Linear issue {identifier}?
linear.sendPreviewComment: Send preview comment from which pr?
